reviews.review_msg: HARD. That's all there's to it. Be prepared to work your @$$ off in this course. 3.5+? Haha try 4.0+. Gary is a nice guy though.
SUPER Tough... hardest course even in SFU... SUPER tough MTs and Finals, u won't even believe how hard the materials can get!

The best professor I've ever met. However, this course is tough and the exam is really hard coz most students need this course to get admission to the actuarial science. Anyway, if you want to take the SOA exam and want to really know something about theory of interest, take his course.

Never!!!!! take this course unless u really want to get into acma program.got worst mark I never seen in my entire school life.Never believe in his saying " all problems on the test will be from your assignments and practice problems in your book"
